componentInstanceProperties.name: filter
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Action Item' AND (PgM_Status__c = 'Open' OR PgM_Status__c = 'Overdue') AND (PgM_Visibility__c <> '1 - Workstream')

componentInstanceProperties.name: filter
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Action Item' AND (PgM_Status__c = 'Open' OR PgM_Status__c = 'Overdue') AND (PgM_Visibility__c = '1 - Workstream')

componentInstanceProperties.name: filter
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Issue' AND (PgM_Status__c = 'Open' or PgM_Status__c = 'Overdue') AND (PgM_Visibility__c <> '1 - Workstream')

componentInstanceProperties.name: filter
componentInstanceProperties.value: RecordType.Name = 'Issue' AND (PgM_Status__c = 'Open' or PgM_Status__c = 'Overdue') AND (PgM_Visibility__c = '1 - Workstream')
